pr_title: EQL: Remove case_sensitive request option and make eql to be case sensitive by default

timeline.message:
Remove case_sensitive request option
Make EQL case sensitive by default and adapt some of the string functions
Remove the case sensitive option from Between string function
Add case_insensitive option to term and wildcard queries usage

timeline.author: matriv

replies.bodyText: No, I wanted to keep it there on purpose. The way the functions deal with case sensitivity is undecided still.
replies.author: astefan

timeline.body: Same here - for older version we should write `true` (always case sensitive).
timeline.bodyText: Same here - for older version we should write true (always case sensitive).
timeline.bodyHTML: Same here - for older version we should write true (always case sensitive).
